actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Energy Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that expenditures for woodburning stoves shall be eligible for the residential energy credit for energy conservation expenditures.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for the installation of a woodburning stove.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that expenditures for woodburning stoves shall be eligible for the residential energy credit for energy conservation expenditures.
